Name: Fennor
Traits: Reckless. At the start of its turn, Fennor can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.
Actions: Multiattack. Fennor makes two attacks with her greatsword Greatsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
